name: Hardest Roll the Ball Maze
description:
Play the Classic dynamic Roll the ball maze with fluid acclero control.Play

Challenges.Solve the "HARDEST" custom mazes 

Key Feature:
*Play 100+ procedurally generated lvls
*Get each time different maze lvl
*Double Ball Chalenge
*Flip Control Challenge
*Create Custom Insanity lvl mazes (Input Size of maze>100 , for insanity lvl)
